ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to add and remove data-series and their associated RenderableSeries using SciChart.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to programmatically add and remove series in code. This is achieved by changing the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.SciChartSurface~RenderableSeries.html']SciChartSurface.RenderableSeries[/url] collection at runtime.
Click 'Add Series' several times. Now click to select a series. With a series selected, click 'Delete Series'.
The same thing can be achieved in MVVM, using our new MVVM [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#MVVM%20DataSeries%20RenderableSeries%20API.html']SeriesBinding[/url] Markup Extension.
